item.title: 2: Linear Regression with Multiple Regressors
item.description: Introduction Reference book (Theory): Introduction to Econometrics by Stock and Watson, 3e. The data are taken from the Companion Website for Introduction to Econometrics book. Omitted variable bias Example #1: Percentage of English learners What was our previous assessment about testscr? We estimated the linear model \(\hat{testscr} = 698.9-2.27\times str\) Interpretation: Class with higher str i.e.Â larger class size tend to have lower testscr.
